tweet:
Countries where Twitter is banned:
1) China
2) North Korea
3) Iran

It requires a special category of 'neechta' to put India in this league.

@kapsology Countries which haven't signed NPT or have withdrawn but have nuclear weapons:
1) India
2) Pakistan 
3) North Korea

What category are you talking about here? Just see how developed China is when compared with India...

@kapsology Netizens can't suppress the executive rights of Governments elected by Citizens. 

A private company can't be an arbitrator of public Truth in general and particularly using its monopoly.

replies.tweet: @DesiSanghiBhakt @kapsology This government was elected to do development. Not play ban politics.
